interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ALICE 13x6 Lace Front Brown Wig, 22" Long Deep Part Silky Straight Synthetic Flaxen Brown Wig for Women, Pre Plucked with Natural Hairline and Baby Hair
Review Date: 2020/01/19
Store: ALICE
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'ALICE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.57 x 7.72 x 1.89 inches; 14.11 Ounces'}
Review Text: Mine is not brown. It has Pastel pink on and dark blonde underneath. it’s also way too big even when the straps are adjusted. I feel like I didn’t get anything close to what I ordered.
Review Title: Not what I ordered.
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

See more', 'Item Volume': '1 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 2.27 inches; 0.7 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1303', 'Department': 'unisex-adult', 'UPC': '855394003034', 'Manufacturer': 'PMD Personal Microderm', 'Country of Origin': 'Vietnam', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Item can be shipped within U.S.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More'} Loving my PMD!
Bought these because I'm extra sensitive on cheeks. Great [KARADIUM] PUCCA LOVE EDITION Cheek & Shading 5.4g - 5 Colors (#03 BABY PINK) {'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.3 x 2.3 x 0.4 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '887406060773'} Nice smooth texture and good payoff with finger swatch. Very nice girlish colour. No smell. Five Stars Soap for Geeks - BEST SELLER! 6 oz Soap by Whiskey River Soap Co. Whiskey River Soap Co. {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Whiskey River Soap Co.', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '6 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '7.4 x 3.9 x 2.5 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GEE-S', 'UPC': '687437825361'} Smells so good Yummy Holika Holika [Sweet Peko Edition] Peko Melty Jelly Blusher Tint 03 Melting Strawberry … HOLIKA HOLIKA {'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Brand': 'HOLIKA HOLIKA', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '1.9 x 1.8 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} The pot is three times the size it needs to be.
The product fills up about 1/4.
Seems like there is way too little product for the cost. Deceitful photo describing product. Aveeno Absolutely Ageless Pre-Tox Peel Off Antioxidant Face Mask with Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Vitamin E & Blackberry Complex, Non-Comedogenic, Paraben- & Phthalate-Free, 0.35 oz (Pack of 3) Aveeno {'Brand': 'Aveeno', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliator,Exfoliate', 'Scent': 'Blackberry', 'Material Type Free': 'Phthalate-free,Paraben-free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.28 x 3.62 x 0.47 inches; 1.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '191567912414'} Never has a peel off mask removed a layer of skin.
Be very careful.
I’m always able to use them to this area which is the high cheek not the under eye.
Never any issues before with other products but for some reason this one it was. Very agressive peel off mask which took skin with it. ALICE 13x6 Lace Front Brown Wig, 22" Long Deep Part Silky Straight Synthetic Flaxen Brown Wig for Women, Pre Plucked with Natural Hairline and Baby Hair ALICE {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'ALICE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.57 x 7.72 x 1.89 inches; 14.11 Ounces'} Mine is not brown. It has Pastel pink on and dark blonde underneath. it’s also way too big even when the straps are adjusted. I feel like I didn’t get anything close to what I ordered. Not what I ordered.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare and Makeup Enthusiast:** Engages actively with skincare and makeup, valuing both beauty enhancement and skin health.
- **Sensitivity-Savvy Skincare Focus:** Prefers gentle, effective solutions, particularly for sensitive areas, reflecting caution in product selection after previous adverse reactions.
- **Quality-Conscious Purchaser:** Shows a strong preference for high-quality items, now increasingly focused on product transparency, value, and effective performance.
- **Integrated Beauty Routine:** Maintains a comprehensive beauty regimen that encompasses both regular skincare and makeup use, emphasizing holistic self-care.
- **Diverse Product Appreciation:** Avoids gender bias in product choices, favoring versatile options that cater to various needs.
- **Critical but Fair Review Giver:** Recently intensified scrutiny in reviews, marking a shift toward a more discerning approach to product efficacy and value.
- **Positive Experience Recognition with Caution:** While typically acknowledging satisfaction with purchases, there is an emerging trend of critical evaluations, especially in light of negative experiences.
- **Scent-Minded Selection:** Enjoys fragrant products but is now more discerning, especially following encounters with aggressive formulations.

**Recent Interaction Note:** The user expressed significant dissatisfaction with a recent purchase due to discrepancies in product representation and fit, indicating a heightened emphasis on accurate descriptions and quality assurance in their shopping experiences. This experience reflects a broader trend towards increased vigilance regarding the reliability of product expectations.
